Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to compensation of the mayor, public advocate, members of the city council, borough presidents, comptroller and district attorneys.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Compensation of the mayor, public advocate, members of the city council, borough presidents, comptroller and district attorneys.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to compensation of the mayor, public advocate, members of the city council, borough presidents, comptroller and district attorneys.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Compensation of the mayor, public advocate, members of the city council, borough presidents, comptroller and district attorneys.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Comrie, Sears, Jackson, Gonzalez, Gentile, Nelson, Avella, Brewer, Mealy, Koppell, Rivera, Speaker Quinn, deBlasio and Gerson
